message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $170?  It's a high-quality product that you won't regret.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $170 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $140, but no more. Can you consider that?
